1)         Updated storage unit Insurance copy

2)         Signed Lease (2 Sets) 

3)         Specimen signature of the Lease signatory(2 pages) – will be sent along with Lease Agreement. 

4)         Valid TL copy/MOA copy of the company/ POA of the authorized signatory (if not in MOA) /PP copy/EID copy

5)         Payment receipt/Cheque copy/ PP copy/EID copy of the Cheque signatory

 

Best regards, 

 

Eilaine Pascual
Operations Administrator
Mall Operations
